Posts.Title: Liver, lung, bone, and brain...Oh my! Watson cmb35

Posts.Content: Sep 8, 2009 10:34AM lesamariekey wrote:    SORRY to hear the news. I know it has to be hard for you and your family. You have already been given the best advice. The pathology report is where you will find the answers. That is where I had to find mine. I had to figure it out for myself, and I did with help from the net and family. I was devastated when I figured mine out. I could not believe that my surgeon did not know what stage or anything. Anyway I am triple negative and stage IV. I have mets in my lungs. And I had to ask for my scans as well.....You have to be your own Advocate. ......Of course I am not upset with my Dr. he is only human.......Besides it's not his fault. I am here if you need someone. .....Lesa Marie
